channel.title: CryptedPkz - A new revolution - F2P & P2P
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dqm6fk.png[/img]
Siriously moparscape should fix there forums-.- half of the pics doesnt load and the post thingy is crap...
BETA VERSION STARTS AT 5-20-2010 ( may get later )
About CryptedPkz : CryptedPkz will be The extreme PK server F2P + P2P. F2p will only be used for non-member items if someone with member items logs in to a F2P world the items will be Named "Members Item" This server will be running 24/7 once the server is done. But not just PK'ing also fun for the Skillers and people who like minigames!
On 4-17-2010 this project has started with alot of fun into it. i posted this project here so you all can help me with suggestions because its all about the players RIGHT!?.
Done: 0% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 100%
Updates planned : [s]Adding a minigame to get P2P.[/s] Just 2 worlds since there are lots of people complaining. Getting all skills done.
CryptedPkz - If u spam on this thread you will be reported. - if you say something bad also say what to fix/add.
Features: Quote: Duel arena. Pest control. Barrows. Fight pits. Fight caves. woodcutting. Mining. Smithing. fishing. Runecrafting. Thieving. Herblore. Fletching. Crafting. Agility. Slayer. Magic following. Magic autocasting. Ranged following. Working knives,darts,throwing axe´s. Melee following. Most Special attacks working. Correct timers. Clanchat. Equipment screen. Kept items on death. All doors working. Most npc Emotes working. World wide Npc´s!. 100% Combat system. Godsword Stands,blocks,attacks,specials. All other wep Anims and gfx. Quest´s. Home Varrock Member + Non-Member World's
Member & non-Member Difference: Quote: Non-members have 1 quests. Member's have 6 quests. Members have more Skills Non-members only have the runescape F2P skills Non members will only be able to wear items from Bronze to Rune. but no Rune Arrows,javalins,knifes,Darts ETC... Members will be able to go to Mage bank and non members wont. Members will be able to use wilderness obelisks non members wont. [/center]
Pictures: [CENTER] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/14kz8dy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nusy8h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/20350o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/16m2b7c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/j8fafa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/5y6xk8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/okd3iw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25k244i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wvc2dg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/o7u5vq.png[/img] [/CENTER]
Support: [QUOTE] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/20tlcth.png[/img]
By R 0 F L [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/20tlcth.png[/IMG Dont forget to add a ] after [/IMG
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dqm6fk.png[/img]
By R 0 F L [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dqm6fk.png[/IMG Dont forget to add a ] after [/IMG
Credits: Jagex: RuneScape 2. Palidino76: Base. B 0 N E: Editing.
Name on google : R 0 F L Name on Moparscape : N V B

item.title: CryptedPkz - A new revolution - F2P & P2P
item.dc:creator: @N_V_B N V B
item.description:
@N_V_B wrote:

[center]

dqm6fk.png633×581

Siriously moparscape should fix there forums-.- half of the pics doesnt load and the post thingy is crap…

BETA VERSION STARTS AT 5-20-2010 ( may get later )

About CryptedPkz :
CryptedPkz will be The extreme PK server F2P + P2P.
F2p will only be used for non-member items if someone with member items logs in to a F2P world the items will be Named “Members Item” This server will be running 24/7 once the server is done.
But not just PK’ing also fun for the Skillers and people who like minigames!

On 4-17-2010 this project has started with alot of fun into it.
i posted this project here so you all can help me with suggestions because its all about the players RIGHT!?.

Done: 0% ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| 100%

Updates planned :
Adding a minigame to get P2P. Just 2 worlds since there are lots of people complaining.
Getting all skills done.

CryptedPkz

  • If u spam on this thread you will be reported.
  • if you say something bad also say what to fix/add.

Features:
Quote:
Duel arena.
Pest control.
Barrows.
Fight pits.
Fight caves.
woodcutting.
Mining.
Smithing.
fishing.
Runecrafting.
Thieving.
Herblore.
Fletching.
Crafting.
Agility.
Slayer.
Magic following.
Magic autocasting.
Ranged following.
Working knives,darts,throwing axe´s.
Melee following.
Most Special attacks working.
Correct timers.
Clanchat.
Equipment screen.
Kept items on death.
All doors working.
Most npc Emotes working.
World wide Npc´s!.
100% Combat system.
Godsword Stands,blocks,attacks,specials.
All other wep Anims and gfx.
Quest´s.
Home Varrock
Member + Non-Member World’s

Member & non-Member Difference:
Quote:
Non-members have 1 quests.
Member’s have 6 quests.
Members have more Skills
Non-members only have the runescape F2P skills
Non members will only be able to wear items from Bronze to Rune.
but no Rune Arrows,javalins,knifes,Darts ETC…
Members will be able to go to Mage bank and non members wont.
Members will be able to use wilderness obelisks non members wont. [/center]
